items.title: First Charge against the 2016 Capital Budget for Water and Waste Department Capital

motions.subject: That the Winnipeg Public Service be directed to review the Province’s commitment to the Blue Dot project, which recognizes people’s rights to live in a health environment, and report back to the Standing Policy Committee on Water and Waste, Riverbank Management and the Environment.
motions.disposition: AUTOMATIC REFERRAL TO THE STANDING POLICY COMMITTEE ON WATER AND WASTE, RIVERBANK MANAGEMENT AND THE ENVIRONMENT
